title: You don't grant any copyright license to github

tosdr.case: you publish under a free license, not a bilateral one
tosdr.tldr: “We claim no intellectual property rights over the material you provide to the Service. Your profile and materials uploaded remain yours. However, by setting […] your repositories to be viewed publicly, you agree to allow others to view and fork your repositories.”
